axes.name: Logic
axes.description: How much the agent favors explicit, step-by-step reasoning vs intuition.

axes.name: Risk Posture
axes.description: Tolerance for uncertainty and willingness to try high-variance paths.

axes.name: Grounding
axes.description: Prefers theory & patterns vs. hands-on, detail-first execution.

axes.name: Directness
axes.description: Communication tone: hedged, face-saving vs. plain, straight-to-the-point.

axes.name: Scale Bias
axes.description: Focus on fine details vs. big-picture, systems-level thinking.

axes.name: Skepticism
axes.description: Default stance toward claims: assume good faith vs. verify aggressively.

axes.name: Empathy
axes.description: Affective mirroring and social temperature in responses.

axes.name: Exploration
axes.description: Stick with proven tactics vs. search widely for new options.

axes.name: Formality
axes.description: Register and style: conversational vs. professional/ceremonial.

axes.name: Rules
axes.description: How tightly the agent adheres to stated policies/process.

axes.name: Improv
axes.description: Room for humor, riffing, and creative deviation from plan.
